name: NPR
text:
A new list from the Small Business Administration shows that the sectors that received the largest share of federal loans under the PPP include restaurants, doctors' offices, car dealerships and law firms.
https://t.co/baNozxZhjM

name: NPR
text:
"I hear a woman in the crowd yell out, 'Don't kill him.' And in that second, I realize that she's talking about me," says Vauhxx Booker, who says a group of white men assaulted him in Indiana on July 4.

The FBI is investigating the attack as a hate crime.
https://t.co/b9AJtYa5Og
